name: Plant Pets
description:
This mobile app is to help those understand the basics of gardening!

Have you ever said:

          -Gardening is not for me

         -I kill every plant I own

         -I don't have a big enough place for a garden

         -I wish I knew where to start

     If yes, then this app will help you learn the basic terminology of gardening, as well as take care of virtual plants that display cute facial emotions! If not, but you enjoy cozy style games, give this one a try!

     Overall the purpose of the game is to help those understand what it takes to start a tiny garden. While incorporating informal learning in the process to help those discuss plant issues with their local nursery, start plants from seeds, and walk through the responsibilities of owning plant. After some game I hope you have some understanding of what your real life plants need to survive, or inspire you to start your own tiny garden!
